message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor to start.
I think a 55/45 split is fairer, Alice.  Let's start with a more balanced proposal.
Bob, time is running out and the value keeps dropping. I'm offering 65/35 - take it or leave it.
Alice, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about a 52/48 split? We can both benefit from a fair deal, and we have plenty of time left.
Bob, I'm sticking to my guns. 60/40 is my final offer. You're losing more with each round that passes.
Alice, I'm willing to move closer to your offer, but I can't go any lower than 45. Let's make a deal before the money loses more value.
